content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Greetings, Hassan. Thank you for your interest in the apartment. I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement on the rental price. May I ask what your budget is for renting this space?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay a reasonable price. How much would you like to propose?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Well, Hassan, I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out this apartment. I would like to propose a rental price of €1,200 per month. This is a fair market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in New York City. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I can accept that price. I agree to the price of €1,200 per month.

Thank you for the opportunity to rent this apartment. I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Excellent, Hassan. I am glad we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to me. I look forward to welcoming you as my tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
